description: Mock Claude response for productivity insights

insights.title: Peak Productivity Hours
insights.description: You complete most tasks between 9 AM and 12 PM. Consider scheduling important work during this window.

insights.title: Consistency Streak
insights.description: You've completed at least one task every day for the past 7 days. Great momentum!

insights.title: Time Estimation Accuracy
insights.description: Your time estimates are 15% lower than actual time spent. Consider adding a buffer to estimates.

insights.title: Category Imbalance
insights.description: 80% of completed tasks are work-related. Consider allocating time for personal and home tasks.

recommendations: Schedule home maintenance tasks on weekends
Use time blocking for deep work sessions
Review and update task priorities weekly
